title: Developing Confidence On and Off the Field
itunes:author: Featured Guest: Dr. David Clarke
itunes:summary:
Less than one percent of little league players make it to the major leagues. But even if your child doesn't become a professional athlete, playing sports is a valuable learning opportunity. John and Danny offer tips for helping your child gain confidence.

Find us online at focusonthefamily.com/parentingpodcast or call 1-800-A-FAMILY.

Get Dr. David Clarke's book "Parenting is Hard and Then You Die" for your donation of any amount: https://donate.focusonthefamily.com/don-fofp-podcast-2021-01-05?refcd=1072913

Get more episode resources: https://www.focusonthefamily.com/episodes/focus-on-parenting-podcast/developing-confidence-on-and-off-the-field/#featured-resource-cta

If you've listened to any of our podcasts, please give us your feedback: focusonthefamily.com/podcastsurvey
